job.title: Information Technology (IT) Internship Program 2022
job.description: <strong><u>Description<br><br></u></strong>At Koch Industries, our mission is to help people improve their lives by making and innovating valuable products and services. We have a variety of companies that work in many industries and create thousands of essential products that you use every day. Industry leaders like <strong>Georgia-Pacific</strong>, <strong>INVISTA</strong> and <strong>Guardian, </strong>manufacture many of the materials that go into your home. We even have companies who create transformative technology and fuel transportation, like <strong>Infor,</strong> <strong>Molex </strong>and <strong>Flint Hills Resources! <br><br></strong>At Koch, we believe that everyone should be an entrepreneur no matter what role they are in. As an intern, co-op or new graduate, there are countless opportunities for you to be challenged, have your voice heard and gain real experience within our companies. Sound exciting? Do you want to be a part of meaningful work? Kickstart your career with us by applying today!<br><br>What You Will Do In Your Role<br><br>Koch Industries is undergoing rapid digital transformation and multi-million-dollar projects that are calling your name. With Koch Industries, you will be joining a team that is keeping us at the forefront of technology. Find your niche as a business systems analyst, software developer, or within specialties that include networking, application support, servers, storage, and security among others.<br><br>Successful candidates may be placed in one of the following areas of concentration among others:<br><ul><li>Access Governance </li><li>AI/Machine Learning</li><li>Application Systems Analyst</li><li>Business Systems Analyst</li><li>Cloud Analyst/Engineer </li><li>Computing </li><li>Industrial Robotics/Manufacturing Automation </li><li>IoT (Internet of Things)</li><li>Security Analyst </li><li>Software Development </li><li>Web/Mobile Development<br></li></ul>Primary locations for 2022 are: Atlanta, GA; Lisle, IL; Wichita, KS<br><br>Additional Locations: Green Bay, WI<br><br>The Experience You Will Bring<br><br><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>Currently enrolled in a degree or certificate program related to one of the following areas: Computer Science, Information Systems, Management Information Systems, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Math, Computational Finance or related IT field</li><li>Eligible for full-time employment between December 2022 and August 2023<br></li></ul>What Will Put You Ahead<br><ul><li>Initiative, natural curiosity, strong communication skills, and an aptitude for fast-paced learning<br></li></ul>Want to Learn More<br><br>Let’s keep the conversation going! Visit our website and connect with us on LinkedIn to learn more information about the Koch Companies.<br><br>Learn More About Our Companies<br><br>Learn More About Our Products<br><br>Koch Industries |LinkedIn<br><br><strong><u>Salary And Benefits Commensurate With Experience.<br><br></u></strong>Equal Opportunity Employer.<br><br>Except where prohibited by state law, all offers of employment are conditioned upon successfully passing a drug test.<br><br>This role may be open to remote candidates residing in the U.S. except within the state of Colorado.<br><br>This employer uses E-Verify.
